holidays.title: National Cheese Day
holidays.description: This day is in reverence of the queen of all dairy, the big cheese.

holidays.title: National Hug Your Cat Day
holidays.description: Scoop your regal cat right off the ground and snuggle the heck out of it!

holidays.title: Audacity To Hope Day
holidays.description: It’s our hope for a brighter future that keeps us going. Today we celebrate our indomitable spirit.

holidays.title: International Corgi Day
holidays.description: The corgi is a dog breed with short legs, a long body, and a huge heart.

holidays.title: International Day of Innocent Children Victims of Aggression
holidays.description: There are more child refugees than the entire population of some of the world’s countries.

holidays.title: National Christian T-Shirt Day
holidays.description: Declare your faith and wear it on a t-shirt! Let’s celebrate National Christian T-Shirt Day.

holidays.title: National Cognac Day
holidays.description: Enjoy this amber drink as we tell you all about its history and facts.

holidays.title: National Old Maids Day
holidays.description: Honor the undying spirit of the women who broke away from social pressures and societal norms.

holidays.title: National SAFE Day
holidays.description: Protect our little loved ones by raising awareness about firearm safety and storage.

holidays.title: National Tailors Day
holidays.description: Here is all that you need to know to celebrate and enjoy National Tailors Day.

holidays.title: Shopping Cart Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate the baskets on wheels we use to journey through the aisles in a supermarket.

holidays.title: Angelina Jolie’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Hollywood actress has created a timeless legacy that will always remain relevant.

holidays.title: Joyce Meyer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meyer’s mission is to help people live by Jesus Christ's words and avoid wrongdoing.

holidays.title: Mackenzie Ziegler’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young talented star has accomplished a lot, and she is not slowing down anytime soon.

holidays.title: Quincy Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young star was raised by P. Diddy, who launched his career in its early stages.

holidays.title: Sykkuno’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sykkuno is an incredible gamer who might give you a good run for your money.
